sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { LoginComponent } from './components/login/login.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { constructor(public router: Router){ } title = 'read-reports'; loggedIn: boolean = true; }
